channel.title: Crowdlisten - Terry Chen
channel.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: Google NotebookLM - Long Context Windows and Multimodality
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Exploring Google NotebookLM's approach to long context windows and multimodal AI interactions for research and knowledge management.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Weighing Social Interactions: Reconstructing Meaning from Large Multi-modal Datasets
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Technical analysis of AI-powered search systems and topic modeling approaches, exploring semantic retrieval, embedding spaces, and the challenges of modern web crawling.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen
